item.title: Conditional Neural Process
item.description: Marta Garnelo et al., 2018 Keyword: Bayesian, Process Problem: Weakness of knowledge sharing and data inefficiency of classical supervised learning Solution: Stochastic Process + NN Benefits: Data efficient, prior sharing Contribution: Encapsulation of parameterized NN function family.
